thread.title: Abercrombie & Fitch Swings to Loss But Hollister Shows Improvement
thread.title_full: Abercrombie & Fitch Swings to Loss But Hollister Shows Improvement - WSJ

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Abercrombie & Fitch Swings to Loss But Hollister Shows Improvement
text:
Abercrombie & Fitch Inc. swung to a loss, hurt by weaker sales, but moves to reposition its Hollister brand showed signs of improvement and the companyâ€™s adjusted bottom line was much better than Wall Street had expected.
Shares jumped sharply, up 15% in premarket trading to $19.79.
The company posted a loss for its fiscal second...
